eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

eventDecorators.name: UBIBeneficiaryCreated
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when a new UBIBeneficiary has been created. Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

eventDecorators.name: UBIReconciliationAccountCreated
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when a new UBIReconciliationAccount has been created. Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

functionDecorators.name: createProxiedUBIBeneficiary
functionDecorators.description: Create a new UBI Beneficiary proxy contract.

functionDecorators.name: createProxiedUBIReconciliationAccount
functionDecorators.description: Create a new UBI Reconciliation proxy contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _custodian
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the custodian target address.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

parameterDecorators.name: _proxy
parameterDecorators.description: Address of either a UBIBeneficiary or ReconciliationAccount proxy.
